#include<iostream> 
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	long long int n,m,i,j,k,l,p,r1,r2;
	cin>>n>>m;
	while(n!=0&&m!=0)
	{
		long long int carry=0,sum=0;
		if(n>m)
		while(n!=0)
		{
			r1=n%10;
			r2=m%10;
			sum+=r1+r2;
			sum/=10;
			if(sum>0)
			carry++;
			n/=10;
			m/=10;
		}
		else
		while(m!=0)
		{
			r1=n%10;
			r2=m%10;
			sum+=r1+r2;
			sum/=10;
			if(sum>0)
			carry++;
			n/=10;
			m/=10;
		}
		
		if(carry==0)
		cout<<"No carry operation."<<endl;
		else if(carry==1)
		cout<<"1 carry operation."<<endl;
		else
		cout<<carry<<" carry operations."<<endl;
		cin>>n>>m;
	}
}
